definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Blend chopped basil, oil, and vinegar in mini processor until most of basil is pureed.
sentences.chinese: 将紫苏，橄榄油和白醋放进搅拌机中搅打成泥。

sentences.english: The white vinegar, tomato paste, sugar, salt, pepper transferred into the juice.
sentences.chinese: 将白醋，番茄酱，糖，盐，胡椒粉调成汁。

sentences.english: If you are sensitive to alcohol, you can  substitute it with 1/4 cup of white vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 如果你对酒精过敏，可以换成四分之一杯的白醋。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the stability of Potassium Iodate of different contents in pale vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 目的摸清碘酸钾加入白醋中不同含量的稳定性。

sentences.english: To clean them, wipe them with full-strength white vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 为了弄干净它们，可以用白醋擦洗。

sentences.english: Dissolve cane sugar in vinegar. Add the rest of the sauce ingredients to vinegar. Set aside.
sentences.chinese: 片糖溶于白醋内，加入其他芡汁材料待做咕噜汁用。

sentences.english: In my experiments, I used a white vinegar sold in supermarkets.
sentences.chinese: 实验中，Jones使用的是在超市买来的白醋。

sentences.english: Put some vinegar in the pot and boil it to 100 degree.
sentences.chinese: 在壶中用加入白醋，放在火上烧开即可。

sentences.english: Wait until the vinegar has dried, then begin painting.
sentences.chinese: 不过要等到白醋完全变干了之后再涂漆。
